Posts.Content: I have a lump on the top part of my armpit, was wondering if anyone has had anything like this. I go in to see my doctor on Thursday. Thanks for any info. ------------------ Hugs, Panama
Posts.Title: Lump in armpit

Posts.Content: Thank you for your prayers Lori! Hugs, Panama
Posts.Title: lump in armpit???

Posts.Content: Hi Lori, I have a lump in my armpit also, I go to see my doctor on Thursday. Where was your Mom's lump located? Mine is the top part of my armpit. I am very nervous about this, but am leaving it in the Lords hands. Hugs, Panama
Posts.Title: lump in armpit???

Posts.Content: Hi Lori, First let me say that I will keep your Mom in my prayers. I never thought about it being a calcium deposit! It is rather large. I guess that I will find out at my doctor visit. I will update you on Thursday. Thank you for the support! I did find out that my Grandfather's sister had breast cancer, so it is down the line a bit. I am only 34, but I did have a mammogram when I was 28, because of a suspicious lump near my breast, that turned out ok. : Hugs, Panama
Posts.Title: lump in armpit???
